ï»¿RECOMMENI 1ATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, International I )evelopment Association Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Credit (Governance for Private Sector Development Project) to the Republic of Djibouti The undersigned Committee constituted under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of the International D:welopment Association (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association grants to the Republic of Djibouti (the Recipient) a c -edit in an amount equivalent to SDR 1,300,000. The purpose of said credit is to help improve Djibouti's bus ness environment. 1. The Committee has carefully ;tudied the merits of the proposal to grant such a credit, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of the cr -dit are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinic n that the project toward the financing of which the proceeds of such credit are to be applied comes within tI e purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said project is designed to promote the economic development of the Republic of Djibouti and is of high developmental I riority in the light of the needs of the Republic of Djibouti.
ï»¿Republic of Djibouti - 2 - Governance for Private Sector Development Project 3. Accordingly, the Committee fi ids that said project merits financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends said project fo - such assistance. COMMITTEE Senior Vice President and Group General Counsel Nominee Selected by Governor for the Republic of Djibouti egional ice esident Midd e East an 1No Africa Dated at Washington, D.C.
